title.en: Generative Models for High-Entropy Alloy Design
title.zh-Hans: 高熵合金设计的生成模型

summary.en: Exploring variational autoencoders and diffusion models to generate novel high-entropy alloy compositions with targeted mechanical properties.
summary.zh-Hans: 探索变分自编码器和扩散模型，生成具有目标力学性能的新型高熵合金组分。

problem_statement.en: The compositional space of high-entropy alloys is vast and largely unexplored. Generative models can propose promising candidates that satisfy multiple property constraints simultaneously.
problem_statement.zh-Hans: 高熵合金的组分空间广阔且大部分未被探索。生成模型可以提出同时满足多个性能约束的有前景候选材料。

contributions.en: Conditional VAE for multi-objective alloy generation; property-guided diffusion sampling.
contributions.zh-Hans: 用于多目标合金生成的条件VAE；性能引导的扩散采样。
